head.title: Poor Driving Habits Indicate Danger Ahead

hedline.hl1: Poor Driving Habits Indicate Danger Ahead

abstract.p: John O'Connell letter on May 28 article holds real estate saleswoman Iris Kalt's reckless driving habits could cause serious or fatal accident (S)

block.p: Regarding Iris Kalt, the article should have been titled ''A Serious Accident Waiting to Happen.''

With statements such as ''The Mercedes parked cross grained over two diagonal parking spaces,'' ''racing from one property to the next,'' ''She treats stop signs as suggestions,'' ''honking her horn and overtaking a slower car'' and ''the fender bender she had while rushing to see a house,'' it is only a matter of time before she causes a serious or fatal accident.
